commit.message:
Use effective-target instead of -std options

	* testsuite/*: Use { target c++11 } or { target c++14 } instead of
	using -std in dg-options.

From-SVN: r239777

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@
+2016-08-26  Jonathan Wakely  <jwakely@redhat.com>
+
+	* testsuite/*: Use { target c++11 } or { target c++14 } instead of
+	using -std in dg-options.
+
 2016-08-26  Jonathan Wakely  <jwakely@redhat.com>
 	    Pedro Alves  <palves@redhat.com>
